check_api_key.description: Input your PurpleAir API key. If you have both a read and write API key, this should be the read API key.

choice_sensor_selection.description:
A PurpleAir sensor can be added to Home Assistant in two different ways:

1. You can search for the sensor nearest to a latitude/longitude.
2. You can add a sensor by its "index" (its ID).

menu_options.by_coordinates: Search for sensors nearby to a latitude/longitude

by_coordinates.description: Search for a PurpleAir sensor within a certain distance of a latitude/longitude.

data.distance: The radius (in kilometers) to search within

data.sensor_index: The PurpleAir sensor index to track

error.no_sensors_near_coordinates: No sensors found near coordinates (within distance)
